title: Title Race Revival for Liverpool?
description:
The FC crew continue to react to this weekend's results including Liverpool's surprise win over Man City and Real Madrid's dominant victory vs Barcelona. The guys question if fans were writing off Liverpool too soon after a poor start to the season and argue if Real Madrid's youth recruitment is the key to their current success compared to Barcelona. Plus, the panel react to Antoine Griezmann's apology to Atleti fans for leaving.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Can Liverpool's bounce back win kickstart a title charge?; Barcelona free fall continues; Griezmann apologizes to Atleti fans
